Issue.description: The SDK currently has a Close() function that shuts down all clients in all contexts, i.e. channel client, resource mgmt client, event client, etc. If, say, client contexts have been created with different users, it would beÂ more efficient to shut down clients associated with an individual context without affecting other clients. For example, in the case that a user is revoked, you could shut down the clients associated with that user without affecting other clients.
